thread.title: San Fernando Valley weather: Chance of showers, thunderstorms Wednesday
thread.title_full: San Fernando Valley weather: Chance of showers, thunderstorms Wednesday - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: San Fernando Valley weather: Chance of showers, thunderstorms Wednesday
text: The San Fernando Valley on Wednesday morning will see partly cloudy skies, becoming mostly cloudy with 15 mph south winds and a 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms in the afternoon. Highs will be in the mid 80s to around 90. Wednesday night will be mostly cloudy with 15 mph southwest winds and a 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, then a 40 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms overnight. Lows will be in the 60s to around 70. The outlook for the next few days will see mostly cloudy skies with continued cooling and a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Advertisement
